SELECT t.id, t.staff_name, t.staff_code, t.NAME, t.RELATIONS, t.age, t.PROFESSIONAL, t.WORK_UNIT, t.address, CONCAT( t.modifier_name, " 于 ", t.MODIFIED_TIME, " 更新" ) updateDesc FROM ( SELECT f.id, s.staff_name, s.staff_code, f.NAME, dic.label RELATIONS, f.age, f.PROFESSIONAL, f.WORK_UNIT, f.address, usr.USER_NAME modifier_name, f.MODIFIED_TIME FROM mp_familystatus f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.STAFF_id LEFT JOIN mp_userpost u ON u.USER_ID = s.USER_ID AND u.MAIN_POST = 1 LEFT JOIN mp_user usr ON usr.id = f.MODIFIER_CODE LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item dic ON dic.type = 'RELATIONS_TYPE' AND dic.`value` = f.RELATIONS WHERE 1 = 1 AND f.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY f.CREATED_TIME desc ) t WHERE 1 =1
and CONCAT( IFNULL( t.staff_name,''), IFNULL( t.staff_code,''),IFNULL( t.NAME,''),IFNULL( t.RELATIONS,''), IFNULL( t.age,''),IFNULL( t.PROFESSIONAL,''),IFNULL( t.WORK_UNIT,''),IFNULL( t.address,''), IFNULL( t.modifier_name,''),IFNULL( t.MODIFIED_TIME,'') ) LIKE concat('%',#{searchText},'%')
